text: SLIGHTLY BETTER CHECKPOINTS Pause modifying txns while the Œ DBMS takes the checkpoint. — Prevent queries from acquiring write latch | | on table/index pages. — Don't have to wait until all txns finish = before taking the checkpoint. | E:agERil=-3 | T the beginning of the checkpoint. _— — Active Transaction Table (ATT) ÿ 3 ~ — Dirty Page Table (DPT) À £2CMUDB « IM » PI % 4313/1:18:06 - SLIGHTLY BETTER CHECKPOINTS > 8 é 00 ü - 21 - ARIES Database Recovery (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
